Name: Memoire Edp
Description: Mémoire d’une Odeur by Gucci is a fragrance for women and men. Mémoire d’une Odeur was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Chamomile and Bitter Almond; middle notes are Musk, Indian Jasmine and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Cedar and Vanilla. “Everything comes from my obsession with scents: my memory is primarily olfactive so, for me, my sense of smell is my memory. I thought that, deep down, perfume is that thing that even with your eyes closed, brings you to a precise moment in space and time. When we began to work on Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur, I tried to imagine the recollection of a scent that couldn’t easily be identified; a hybrid scent that resembles memory as much as possible,” Alessandro Michele. Scent is in our subconscious, attached to fragments of moments lived, coloring them with emotions of all-consuming joy, of intense love, or overwhelming sadness. A scent can gift a moment again, so an experience from the past can be relived in the now. For a new Gucci fragrance story, scent becomes an explorer of the power of memories, bringing them back from the past and making them live in our present. Skipping backward and forward in chronological time, the present and past are connected by a unique bridge that projects directly into the future. Presenting a new universal Gucci scent. A perfume unassigned with a gender or a time. Presenting Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur. Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur is an elixir that transcends gender by its individuality, to establish a new olfactive family, Mineral Aromatic. The transcendent accord features unexpected and enigmatic ingredients, and is defined by a note of Roman chamomile. Alessandro Michele envisioned this particular flower inside the scent, blended by master perfumer Alberto Morillas. Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur’s Roman chamomile is structured with Indian Coral Jasmine petals for tenderness, precious musks for depth, and noble woods including warm, luminous sandalwood and airy, subtle cedarwood, a powerful tree with deep roots and an irresistible vanilla note. Disrupting the traditional olfactive families that classifies fragrances, Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur establishes a new modern fragrance category, Mineral, which is a mix of scents and emotions: airy, musky, transparent and authentic. Mineral was classically used to describe facets of some fragrances, and combined with Aromatic, it becomes the center of Gucci Memoire d’une Odeur. ”The musky mineral accord is the keystone of the fragrance: it links all the other olfactive elements together with pure softness,” Alberto Morillas. “I had to think quite carefully about why Alessandro chose chamomile. When I started to work with the scent of chamomile itself, then I understood,” Morillas said. “No one had done it before. Chamomile is known all over the world. Everyone has smelt it at some point, but as a dream, a memory of childhood, something timeless, and never in a fragrance. This flower is much underestimated and is a plant with an exceptional olfactive signature.” Roman Chamomile has grown around Rome in terraced gardens since the 16th and 17th centuries. Giving a green aromatic scent, the sunny and hardy flower has an unparalleled character, radiating with joy to a sweet aromatic dry down with honey and green apple. Indian Coral Jasmine Nature Print ® : A note exclusive to Gucci, collected in India, the star-shaped flower emits a more powerful scent and colors at night, remaining lighter and fresher during the day. Referred to as Queen of the Night, the official flower of Bengal, this unique quality of jasmine has a honeyed temper and an orangey coral-colored heart. Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur’s dry down is an evanescent cloud, evolving on skin with a rhythm of Musks and iconic woods: Cedarwood and Sandalwood. The woody architecture of the fragrance brings intensity to its structure. Alessandro Michele discovered a vintage Gucci fragrance bottle, and was inspired by its design for Gucci Mémoire d’une Odeur’s bottle. Grooved like a column from an ancient world, the bottle casts a refined silhouette in heavy transparent light green glass, crowned with shiny gold cap. Printed gold foil frames the label, revealing the Gucci logo together with the name of the fragrance. “The packaging comes from the past, inspired by an old Gucci perfume from the early 90s. I didn’t want the bottle to take on a shape or size that is too feminine or too masculine because the perfume could be very much for women or very much for men,” Alessandro Michele. Symbolizing a starry night sky and the earthly world that gazes up at it in marvel, the perfume’s green box is decorated with Celestial firmaments inspired by the paintings of Roman and gothic churches of the Middle Ages and Renaissance in Europe. This particular pattern recalls Giotto’s frescoes in the Scrovegni Chapel in Padova. “The guiding element of the entire campaign is the idea of freedom; the idea of the non-era, the non-place, the non-social. I pictured a world that was a fresco of a ‘mythological’ life in which the family is a private community with its own social framework where total freedom of expression prevails and where the roles of people and things aren’t clear. I pictured the memory of an authentic memory,” Alessandro Michele. A gathering of a free-spirited family, who embrace life by living freely and making memories together, an idea by Alessandro Michele. In diverse settings on the outskirts of Rome, the family are captured dancing, picnicking at sun kissed ruins of Canale Monterano, and in and around their family home, Montecalvello Castle—a medieval castle featuring a fountain in a courtyard, and enigmatic frescoes inside and out. Director of the campaign Glen Luchford imbues the video and images with vibrant nostalgia, under the artistic direction of Christopher Simmonds. The print advertising campaign is composed like intimate photo albums, that show each member’s character and their intimate rapport with one another. Singer, songwriter and actor Harry Styles leads the cast of the family, which includes an eclectic and universal mix of talents and models: Zumi Rosow (designer and musician), Ariana Papademetropoulos (artist), Stanislas Klossowski de Rola (actor and musician), Olimpia Dior (artist), Leslie Winer (model and musician), Thomas Riguelle (model), Tex Santos-Shaw (model), Tessa Bruinsma (model), Olga Zapivokhina (model), Oleg Ulrich (model), Matïss Rucko (model), Mae Lapres (model), William Valente (model), Katea Gramma (model), Unia Pakhomova (model), Ellia Sophia (model), Elibeidy Dani Martinez (model), Cheikh Tall (model), and Aaron Sirainen (model). The fragrance is available from August 1st 2019 as a 40m, 60ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum, and as a 30ml rollerball bottle.

Top notes are Fruity Notes, Lemon, Bergamot, Green Notes and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Violet, Orris Root, Rose, Ylang-Ylang and Patchouli; base notes are Guaiac Wood, Leather, Amber, Sandalwood and Madagascar Vanilla. Mancera Parfums presents at ESXENCE in Milan a new fragrance in their characteristic flacon, in beautiful blue shades, iridescent from royal blue to light blue turquoise shades. The new perfume AOUD BLUE NOTES opens with citrusy notes, enriched with floral notes of the heart with a chypre twist, resting on warm, rich and deep shades of the base, with dominant scents of oud and leather. Mancera Aoud Blue Notes starts with a citrusy union of bergamot, mandarin and Calabrian lemon, completed with fruity and green notes. The heart introduces floral accords of ylang-ylang, violet, rose and orris, spiced with earthy and woody shades of patchouli leaves. The base accentuates guaiac wood combined with sandalwood, while intense leather and amber provide warmth to the composition. Sensuality originates from the soft Madagascar vanilla. Fragrance Aoud Blue Notes arrives 60 and 120 ml Eau de Parfum.

Next to the name, each fragrance features a year crucial for Lalique history. Élégance Animale 1989 depicts passion of Rene Lalique towards nature and animals. His passionate displays of nature inspired his son, Marc Lalique and granddaughter Marie-Claude Lalique to design the famous work The Zeila panther in 1989. This fragrance is powerful and full of character, and blends harmoniously flowers and fruit with leather undertones. The composition opens with saffron, geranium and peach, the heart continues with rose, jasmine and gurjum balsam on a base of leather and sandalwood.

Fleur Universelle 1900 is a fragrance based on immortelle flower, which is said to have unique power of renewal and capability of resistance to time. Its composition is characterized as chypre, composed of pink pepper, rum and cardamom in top notes; immortelle, myrrh and cinnamon at the heart and molecule lorexon in the base.

Next to the name, each fragrance features a year crucial for Lalique history. Fruits du Mouvement 1977 is the fragrance marking the year when Marie-Claude Lalique took over the control of the company and refreshed it with femininity and modernism. She was in charge of design renewal and introduction of lighter and softer colors into collections. As artist and sculptor, she both a live bird and studied her movements to create her first crystal creation – dove. The fragrance dedicated to her is envisaged as floral-fruity with a woody drydown. The composition starts with black pepper, mandarin and ginger. The heart includes fruity scents, jasmine absolute and plums, while the base closes with cashmeran, amber and sandalwood.

Finally, the brightness of juniper, the main ingredient of the gin and tonic that Hors-Piste recreates to perfection. Falsely wise, one almost feels like saying: just like you!" - a note from the brand.

Description: Rayon Vert by Bastille Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rayon Vert was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Caroline Dumur. Jump into a wild spring awakening with Rayon Vert. Dazzling, green, fresh and zesty with a touch of anis seeds: an explosion of life in a bottle. Under the softness of the first rays of sunshine, walk barefoot in the fresh grass with a smile on your face and reconnect with nature in full bloom. The green and aniseed facets of basil and fennel dance with the warm and radiant immortelle flower.

Description: L'Eau Rêvée D'Isa by Sisley is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Rêvée D'Isa was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bergamot, Pink Pepper and Black Pepper; middle notes are Rose, Water Jasmine and Green Tea; base notes are Oakmoss, Patchouli and Musk. Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY. SUNSHINE FRESH JASMINE. Rêvée d'Isa is the depth and lightness of a seductive dream. Full of contrasts, it links a magical blend of essences with an alchemy that is both obvious and surprising at the same time. Suitable for both men and women, this fragrance hides the vibrancy of white flowers mixed with the intensity of spices. Top notes: bergamot, black pepper, pink pepper. Middle notes: water jasmine, rose, green tea. Base notes: musk, oakmoss, patchouli

Name: L'Eau Revee D'Alma Edt

Top notes are Basil, Bergamot, Ice and Cardamom; middle notes are Watery Notes, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Cedar, Vetiver and Patchouli. Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY. IRISES BETWEEN WATER AND ICE. If the fragrance Rêvée d'Alma were a picture hanging on the wall, it would reflect the French countryside with rivers, ponds and reeds. In the aroma, you can feel the depth of silky clear fresh water, which grabs and awakens you like a crystal song. The combination of delicate watery irises and icy cardamom transforms Rêvée d'Alma into a pure and joyful aroma. Top notes: basil, bergamot, icy cardamom. Middle notes: water iris, jasmine, rose. Base notes: cedar, patchouli, vetiver

Dreams inspire our creativity; they surround us with images, memories and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY. SENSITIVE AND SPICY FRAGRANCE. The taste of a dream... with spicy ginger. Rêvée d'Aria is paired with the perfume's notes of flowers, hints of peach, and leather. The complexity draws you into the aroma of a fancy dress party. Top notes: bergamot, ginger, mandarin orange. Middle notes: osmanthus, peach, black currant, nutmeg. Base notes: patchouli, benzoin, vanilla, leather

Dreams inspire our creativity, they surround us with images, memories, and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY. A BOUQUET OF RETURNS AFTER THE RAIN. Rêvée d'Eliya returns to the rainforest and invites you to immerse yourself in a utopian jungle that comes to life after the rain: a new, untouched garden full of mystical birds and unfamiliar sounds. Its intriguing, warm and aromatic atmosphere is the origin of the sparkling sivas, where exotic flowers combine with tuberose and violets. Top notes: bergamot, leamon, floral notes. Middle notes: jasmine, tuberose, violet. Base notes: cedar, ambrette, patchouli

Description: L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar by Sisley is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau Rêvée D'Ikar was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lemon, Bitter Orange and Geranium; middle notes are Mastic or Lentisque, Iris and Pistachio; base notes are Vetiver, Labdanum and Sandalwood. Dreams inspire our creativity; they surround us with images, memories, and sensations. Les Eaux Rêvées expresses this imagination, where inspirations from different generations come together, collide and complement each other - the d'Ornan family, SISLEY. CRUSHED MASTIC PISTACHIOS. "The most wonderful of the stars became his downfall," wrote the poet Philippe Desportes in one of his beautiful interpretations of the myth of Icarus. Free and adventurous, the fragrance named in honor of Icarus, Rêvée d'Ikar, takes its inspiration from the shining sun, and proud and fresh landscapes of Corsica, one of the places that the d'Ornan family calls home. The essence of green mastic pistachio, an airy resinous shrub, combines with earthy vetiver to reveal warm, unexpected notes. A powerful and seductive aroma.. Top notes: bitter orange, lemon, geranium. Middle notes: pistachio, iris, mastic. Base notes: sandalwood, labdanum, vetiver

Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Lemon', 'Pink Pepper', 'Ginger', 'Cardamom', 'Cinnamon', 'Cedar'], 'Middle Notes': ['Saffron', 'Iris', 'Patchouli', 'Agarwood (Oud)'], 'Base Notes': ['Sandalwood', 'Musk', 'Cashmere Wood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Balsamic Notes', 'Vetiver', 'Amber']}
Description: Midnight to Sunrise by Eternal Journey is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Midnight to Sunrise was launched in 2023. Midnight to Sunrise was created by Pierre Ravan, Ilias Ermenidis and Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Lemon, Pink Pepper, Ginger, Cardamom, Cinnamon and Cedar; middle notes are Saffron, Iris, Patchouli and Agarwood (Oud); base notes are Sandalwood, Musk, Cashmere Wood, Tonka Bean, Balsamic Notes, Vetiver and Amber. The darkness of the night casts its magic, and euphoria rises in dancing Souls. It is time to make a long-lasting impression. Letting go of all the pressures of the outside world, creative energy emerges and lingers until Sunrise. A scent to create Unity and infuse Light into Darkness to fill the space with our presence. The fragrance is designed and crafted with love by Firmenich and Pierre Ravan.

Name: Rose In Wonderland Edp
Description: Rose in Wonderland by Atkinsons is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Rose in Wonderland was launched in 2014. Top notes are Rose and Currant buds; middle notes are Rose and Geranium; base notes are Crystal Amber and Vetiver. House of Atkinsons launches its new collection of fragrances called The Contemporary Collection, which includes three perfumes: Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. The collection represents a modern interpretation of the classic three perfume ingredients. This trio is designed to “transform the familiar into the fabulously unfamiliar in a way that is distinctive and intriguing”. Rose in Wonderland is an intense smell of roses on earthy background. It opens with accords of rose dew and black currant buds; with the heart of geranium and Centifolia rose absolute and the base of vetiver and crystal amber. The fragrances are available as 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Pirates’ Grand Reserve Edp
Description: Pirates' Grand Reserve by Atkinsons is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Pirates' Grand Reserve was launched in 2017. Top notes are Rum, Cacao, Vanilla, Heliotrope and Jasmine; middle notes are Virginia Cedar, Cardamom, Clary Sage, Broom and Geranium; base notes are Cashmeran, Patchouli, Musk and Moss. A new addition to The Contemporary Collection, Pirates’ Grande Reserve comes out in 2017.  Its enticing rum-and-chocolate signature is the very essence of expedition and discovery, vibrant with the thrill – and danger – of the high seas. "Pirates’ Grand Reserve is a rich, adventurous brew of brigands and buccaneers. Chocolate and gloriously aged rum pay delicious homage to English gentlemanpirate Sir Francis Drake, who sailed around the world under Queen Elizabeth I’s flag. As daring and romantic as the legendary explorer, Pirates’ Grand Reserve puts a dangerously intoxicating spin on a perfumery favourite: rum. Full-bodied, fullblooded and, full speed ahead, Pirates’ is a fragrance to walk the plank for." Top notes: rum, cacao, vanilla, heliotrope, jasmineHeart: Virginia cedar, geranium, clary sage, broom, cardamomBase: patchouli, helvetolide, cashmerean, moss. Available as a 100 ml EDP.

Name: Mint&Tonic Edp
Description: Mint & Tonic by Atkinsons is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Mint & Tonic was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Evelyne Boulanger. Top notes are Lime, Mint and Grapefruit; middle notes are Ginger, Geranium and Mandarin Orange; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar and Musk. Atkinsons has launched Mint & Tonic in spring 2018, a new fragrance from the Contemporary Collection. "For this freshest of new editions we have joyously plundered the tranquility of the English Potager Garden to exalt the herbaceous godsend that is mint, the inspiration for the herbaceous thrill that is Atkinsons Mint & Tonic eau de parfum. A fiendishly versatile scent of sparkling freshness and pitch perfect mood elevation.Swooshing into life, light as air, like a skateboard carving upon a gentle gradient. The burst of just crushed mint dissipates into a melodic breeze of floral and herbal-citrus notes. Luminous mandarin, lime and ginger mingle with the more languid, earthy tones of musk and cedar wood. A shimmering fragrance of freshness and sensuality that instantaneously stirs the optimism of summer."Top: Grapefruit, Mint, Lime. Heart: Ginger, Geranium, Mandarin. Base: Cedarwood, Musk, Vetiver. Available as a 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: 24 Old Bond Street Edc
Description: 24 Old Bond Street by Atkinsons is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. 24 Old Bond Street was launched in 2013. 24 Old Bond Street was created by Violaine Collas and Christine Nagel. Top notes are Juniper and Cardamom; middle notes are Whiskey and Rose; base notes are Black Tea, Cedar, Ambergris and Musk.

Name: 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract Edc
Description: 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract by Atkinsons is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract was launched in 2014. 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract was created by Christine Nagel and Violaine Collas. Top notes are Juniper Berries and Cardamom; middle notes are Whiskey and Rose; base notes are Black Tea, Ambergris, Cedar and Musk. Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a new eau de cologne by Atkinsons which celebrates 200 years of the house. This fragrance is not the only one which celebrates this important anniversary but was launched after trilogy The Contemporary Collection which represents fashion interpretations of the three classic perfume ingredients (rose, green notes and lavender) with fragrances Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. 24 Old Bond Street as the fragrant symbol of the house is a typical English eau de cologne with strong character, while the new 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is a highly concentrated version of the basic English cologne. Re-edition of the contemporary EDC 24 Old Bond Street is available in a collection of five fragrance presented in 2013. Composition of the perfume provides juniper berries combined with cardamom in top notes. It is followed by rose aromatized with whiskey, on a base of ambergris, musk, black tea and cedar. The fragrance is signed by perfumers Christine Nagel and Violaine Collas. Cocktail of aromas of juniper, rose and black tea owes particular beauty to woody shades of whiskey providing special smoky charm of oak barrels. Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street Triple Extract is available as 50ml and 100ml Eau de Cologne.

Name: 41 Burlington Arcade Edp
Description: 41 Burlington Arcade by Atkinsons is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. 41 Burlington Arcade was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Pluchet. Top notes are White Pepper, Grapefruit, Citruses, Lemon and Floral Notes; middle notes are Nutmeg, Licorice, Cardamom and Pimento; base notes are Vetiver, Smoke, Cedar, Amber and Musk. 41 Burlington Arcade named after the new address of the shop in London is a dark aromatic fragrance with prominent licorice note, belonging to The Emblematic Collection."Named and dedicated to the new flagship at 41 Burlington Arcade, itself a contemporary paean to English refinement, the fragrance is the latest member of the historic Emblematic Collection. Centred around Liquorice and the revelation of its sensual charms, darkly bittersweet and earthy tones have been sublimated with vivid notes of pink pepper from Reunion Island, West Indian Bay leaf from Dominica and Indonesian Patchouli. Floral transparent notes have been dialed up to deliver freshness and vivacity. The fragrance’s daring individuality and unisex appeal perfectly encapsulates the eclectic spirit of today’s Mayfair. Created by Julie Pluchet who grew up in the bucolic French countryside, it brings a contemporary vision of perfumery driven by an innate intrigue of new olfactive territories" - the note from the brand. Top notes: lemon, grapefruit, white pepper, citrus fusion, transparent flowers. Heart: licorice, cardamom, nutmeg, pimento. Base: vetiver, cedar, amber, musk, smoke fusion. 41 Burlington Arcade will be available as a 100 ml Eau de Parfum. The release is limited to just 1799 bottles.

Name: 44 Gerrard Street Edc
Description: 44 Gerrard Street by Atkinsons is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. 44 Gerrard Street was launched in 2020. Top notes are Lime, Ginger and Eucalyptus; middle notes are Rose, Orchid and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes and Amber.

Name: The Other Side Of Oud Edp

Top notes are Cardamom, Cinnamon and Ginger; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Coffee blossom and Geranium; base notes are Roasted Coffee Beans and Vanilla Absolute. The Other Side of Oud in a masterly way combines the typical woody and classic oud notes with completely new,  modern elements and presents a fascinating reinterpretation of oud. Top notes: ginger, cinnamon, cardamom. Heart note: geranium, coffee blossoms, oud nuances. Base note: vanilla absolu, roasted coffee. 100 ml EDP.

Name: Intense Cedrat Boise Edp
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Sicilian Citruses', 'Black Currant', 'Spices'], 'Middle Notes': ['Leather', 'White Sandalwood', 'Cambodian Oud', 'Patchouli Leaf', 'Jasmine'], 'Base Notes': ['Ambergris', 'Oakmoss', 'Vanilla', 'White Musk']}
Description: Intense Cedrat Boise by Mancera is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. Intense Cedrat Boise was launched in 2021. Top notes are Sicilian Citruses, Black Currant and Spices; middle notes are Leather, White Sandalwood, Cambodian Oud, Patchouli Leaf and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Oakmoss, Vanilla and White Musk. Fresh, fruity, and yet utterly masculine, Cedrat Boise has been a constant source of excitement among Mancera's collection since its release. This perfume extract opens with a sharp, zesty burst of blackcurrant and citrus, Cedrat Boise quickly lays down a sexy heart of jasmine and patchouli beneath the lingering fruity freshness, remaining lively for hours before slowly melting into a sumptuous base of cedar, sandalwood, leather, and musky oakmoss. The one to choose when you can only choose one. Top notes: Sicilian Citrus Fruits, Hot Spices, Blackcurrant. Middle notes: Patchouli Leaves, Leather Notes, Jasmine, Cambodian Oud & White Sandalwood. Base notes: Oriental Grey, White Musk, Vanilla Pods & Wild Oakmoss. Intense Cedrat Boise is available as a 60ml and 120ml Extrait de Parfum.

Name: Paradis Nuit Edp
Description: Paradis Nuit  by Bastille Parfums is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Paradis Nuit  was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Nicolas Beaulieu. Top notes are Soap, Petitgrain and Neroli; middle notes are Cedar, Acácia and Patchouli; base notes are Sandalwood, Cacao Pod and Hay. Open a door, follow the light, and let yourself be guided through the night. Forbidden, audacious, passionate, escapist, playful, or soothing: live your ideal night. A fragrance where the depth of sandalwood and the warmth of bitter cocoa mingle with the comforting light of Marseille soap and cassie flower: an invitation to sensual, reassuring skin-to-skin contact. An eau de parfum created by Nicolas Beaulieu. The perfumer's words: "reassuring, bewitching, sensual." Top notes: neroli, petitgrain, Marseille soap accord. Middle notes: cassie flower, cedar, patchouli. Base notes: cocoa, sandalwood, hay. Its formula is short: it contains 53 ingredients. A classic perfume can contain up to 300 ingredients, only mentioning potentially allergenic ingredients on the label (generally less than 10).  Each raw material was chosen by the perfume's creator, Nicolas Beaulieu.

Name: Oud Minerale Edp
Description: Oud Minérale by Tom Ford is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. Oud Minérale was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Shyamala Maisondieu.

Name: 14 Juillet Edp
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['gunpowder', 'Tangerine', 'Blackcurrant'], 'Middle Notes': ['Violet Leaf', 'Labdanum', 'Cinnamon'], 'Base Notes': ['Madagascar Vanilla', 'Benzoin', 'Tonka Bean']}
Description: 14 Juillet by Bastille Parfums is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 14 Juillet was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Meabh McCurtin. Top notes are gunpowder, Tangerine and Blackcurrant; middle notes are Violet Leaf, Labdanum and Cinnamon; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Benzoin and Tonka Bean. The spirit of Bastille Day in a bottle, like fireworks, the joy of a shared, luminous and universal moment. An explosion of freshness that reveals a “fireworks” accord to better blend into the addictive comfort of Madagascar Vanilla. 14 JUILLET is much more than a date. It is the echo of a French art of living, a timeless ode to the joy of living, union and freedom. This perfume is not limited to a moment or a place, it embodies the spirit of French celebration, this "French Touch" which resonates from the streets of Paris to the villages of the countryside, a fragrant tribute to elegance, to the conviviality and spontaneity that characterize France. 14 JUILLET is an invitation to embrace freedom and joy, at any time and in any season, capturing the essence of being together and celebrating life the French way, every day of the year. 14 JUILLET, every day is a celebration.

Name: Atelier Figue Blanche Edp
Description: Figue Blanche by Versace is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. Figue Blanche was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Marrypierre Julien. Versace launches the Atelier Versace collection of six perfumes in October 2019. The fragrances bear the names Cédrat de Diamante, Éclat de Rose, Figue Blanche, Jasmin au Soleil, Santal Boisé and Vanille Rouge. Each of the creations has one ingredient as a theme, and five perfumers worked on the development of the compositions. Marypierre Julien created Figue Blanche, blending fresh figs with essential oils of mandarin, bergamot, neroli, jasmine and rose. The six fragrances come in the same glass bottle, offered in a translucent version and in a sleek black alternative to distinguish gentle scents from the more intense ones. All bottles feature handmade elements inspired by Versace's fashion collections and brand signature style. The heavy gold cap contains the Medusa logo. The ad campaign shows models as well as tailors working at Atelier Versace. All fragrances are offered in one, 100 ml Eau de Parfum format.

Each of the creations has one ingredient as a theme, and five perfumers worked on the development of the compositions. The six fragrances come in the same glass bottle, offered in a translucent version and in a sleek black alternative to distinguish gentle scents from the more intense ones. Jordi Fernandez designed Vanille Rouge blending Madagascar vanilla with powdered musk accords, almonds and rose. The six fragrances come in the same glass bottle, offered in a translucent version and in a sleek black alternative to distinguish gentle scents from the more intense ones. Description: CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. CK One Essence was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bergamot, White Tea, Blood Orange and Black Pepper; middle notes are Green Tea, Mint and Geranium; base notes are Musk, Moss, Australian Sandalwood and Incense. CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is an intensified, premium take on the iconic original fragrance CK One from 1994. Launched 30 years after the original, this fragrance modernizes its fresh notes while paying homage to its DNA. It is an olfactory symbol of timeless unity, described as explosive, energetic, and captivating. Master perfumer Alberto Morillas formulated this fresh edition, amplifying the concentration for long-lasting, powerful freshness. "The intense fragrance for all. fresh. provocative. unapologetic. Twice as concentrated as the original icon. ck one essence features top notes of sparkling italian bergamot and blood orange for vibrant intensity. organic green tea accords are drenched in a warm base of natural sandalwood and musk. the feeling is clean and sensual. The iconic bottle is fully recyclable, reimagined with a modern translucent metallic finish." Calvin Klein CK One Essence is available in 50ml, 100ml, and 200ml bottles.

Name: Eau D‘ombre Leather Edt
Description: Eau d'Ombré Leather by Tom Ford is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eau d'Ombré Leather was launched in 2024. Eau d'Ombré Leather was created by Sonia Constant and Olivier Gillotin. Top notes are Cardamom, Ginger and Coriander; middle notes are Vanilla and Leather; base note is Ambrofix™. Eau d'Ombré Leather is described as a wildly radiant composition with leather notes made smoother and milder, mixing accords of rich amber, vanilla, glowing leather, and refreshing spices. The composition opens boldly with fresh ginger, coriander, and cardamom. The note of vanilla tincture stokes a glowing leather accord, a sensual flame grounded in a landscape of rich amber and honeyed woods. Eau d’Ombré Leather is packaged in a translucent black bottle with a faux-leather plaque. It is available in quantities of 10ml, 50ml, and 100ml.

Name: Charm Mystery Edp
Description: Charm Mystery by Birkholz is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. Charm Mystery was launched in 2018. Top notes are Tangerine and Lemon; middle notes are Peach, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla and Musk. "Floral, fruity and with a hint of vanilla: Charm Mystery is a scent that can be bitten. The sweet smell of roasted almonds is in the air. A small retro fair invites you to stroll and snack. In addition to the red candied apples, the freshly roasted popcorn exudes this typical aromatic fragrance. The lightness of the moment captivates every visitor." - a note from the brand.

Name: Secret Rendezvous Edp
Description: Secret Rendezvous by Birkholz is a Oriental fragrance for women. Secret Rendezvous was launched in 2018. Top notes are Jasmine, Orange Blossom and Rose; middle notes are Musk, Cedar and Heliotrope; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Vetiver. "Secret Rendezvous is an excitingly mysterious scent of seduction: feminine, sensual, oriental. They have been planning this moment for a long time and have sent out a touch of seduction in their messages. You tried to resist, but the appeal of the forbidden is just too great. Careful and mysterious steps, but with a tingling anticipation in their stomach, they pull the bewitching scent of musk and the vanilla plant heliotrope behind them." - a note from the brand.

Description: Amber Intense by Birkholz is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Amber Intense was launched in 2017. Top notes are Rose, Bergamot, Saffron and Labdanum; middle notes are Apple, Patchouli, Cedar and Guaiac Wood; base notes are Vanilla, Labdanum, Sandalwood and Musk. "Oriental Intense is a fragrance that combines its delicate nuances with woody notes to create an oriental fragrance experience: floral, woody, tart. The exhausting journey behind him, he feels the tickle of curiosity of the unknown.  On the way to the lively Djemaa el Fna, he passes several souks that spread their scent of oriental scents. Busy traders pass him by. Arrived on an elegant roof terrace, he lets his gaze wander over the hustle and bustle of the market and enjoys the moment." - a note from the brand.

Name: Berlin Soul Edp
Description: Berlin Soul by Birkholz is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. Berlin Soul was launched in 2017. Top notes are Hazelnut and Whiskey; middle notes are Cedar, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud), Iris and Vetiver; base notes are Musk, Tonka Bean, Patchouli and Amber. "Berlin Soul is a smoky, pulsating perfume that is addictive. The bass sounds in time with the dancing crowd under the free roofs of Berlin. The smell of tobacco & whiskey pervades the night. Electrifying music runs through the bodies of the crowd. Its seductive scent tells her that it is close. Your eyes meet. Hand in hand, body wrapped tightly dancing to the rhythm of the music. Berlin soul that makes the night unforgettable." - a note from the brand.

Name: Luxury Passion Edp
Description: Luxury Passion by Birkholz is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. Luxury Passion was launched in 2017. Top notes are Water Notes, Orange Blossom and Tangerine; middle notes are Anise, Geranium and Mint; base notes are Sandalwood, Amber and Patchouli. "Luxury Passion is an elegant, fresh fragrance, like a night in Ibiza at the marina: citrusy, minty and slightly woody. Scraps of conversation and soft music blow from the bar. He is looking for a place on the noble leather sofas on the edge of the terrace with a view of the marina. A breath of wind runs through his light jacket and brings the sea breeze of the night with him. The drink decorated with fresh mint lies cool in his hand." - a note from the brand.

Hair flies wildly as the convertible roars along the Amalfi Coast. The last rays of sun warm the face. A unique restaurant, embedded in the rocky landscape, awaits its guests with a limoncello. As the shadows grow longer, the candlelight rings in the evening.  The sweet specialty of the house is eagerly awaited after dinner: creme brulee from the aphrodisiac tonka bean." - a note from the brand.

Description: Pacific Drive by Birkholz is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. Pacific Drive was launched in 2020. Top notes are Lemon, Sage and Green Leaves; middle notes are Cedar, Orange Blossom and Magnolia; base notes are Patchouli, Amber and Musk. "Pacific Drive combines the summer freshness of lemon and orange blossom with aromatic notes of sage and the free spirit of Patchouli. Blue skies, a light breeze and the endless expanse of the Pacific Coast Highway: a journey towards adventure. The bright sun on the coast makes all worries disappear and the dream of freedom is within reach. Pacific Drive exudes the ultimate California feeling and is an invitation to new horizons." - a note from the brand.

Name: Citrus Splash Edp
Description: Citrus Splash by Birkholz is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. Citrus Splash was launched in 2019. Top notes are Bergamot and Neroli; middle notes are Tea Rose and Freesia; base notes are Cedar and Musk. "Citrus Splash is a composition as lively, cool and excessive as an adventure on Mexico's white sandy beaches. Turquoise blue sea, the sun draws the shadow of the palm trees on the white sandy beach in Tulum. Cool music from well-known DJ`s on the Caribbean coast initiates the transition from day to night. Citrus Splash exudes the feeling of vitality in this magical place. A fragrance that invigorates and makes us dream of paradise." - a note from the brand.

Name: 11:11 The Energy Frequency Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Lime', 'Guava', 'Artemisia', 'Bergamot', 'Ginger'], 'Middle Notes': ['Water Notes', 'Mint', 'Lemon Blossom', 'Jasmine', 'Cardamom'], 'Base Notes': ['Musk', 'Amber', 'Woody Notes', 'Vetiver', 'Fruity Notes', 'Orris Root']}
Description: 11:11 by FreeShape Milano is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 11:11 was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Lime, Guava, Artemisia, Bergamot and Ginger; middle notes are Water Notes, Mint, Lemon Blossom, Jasmine and Cardamom; base notes are Musk, Amber, Woody Notes, Vetiver, Fruity Notes and Orris Root. FreeShape Milano entitles this fragrance after this master digit, with the aim of creating a direct channel of energy between those who wear it and the dynamic forces surrounding humanity. The powerful energy conferred by this master digit brings great sensibility and awareness to those who wear this fragrance.

Name: Ama Share Your Love Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Lemon', 'Rose', 'Raspberry', 'Palisander Rosewood'], 'Middle Notes': ['Geranium', 'Turkish Rose', 'Gardenia'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Agarwood (Oud)Saffron', 'Patchouli', 'Amber', 'Brown sugar']}
Description: Ama by FreeShape Milano is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ama was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Lemon, Rose, Raspberry and Palisander Rosewood; middle notes are Geranium, Turkish Rose and Gardenia; base notes are Vanilla, Agarwood (Oud), Saffron, Patchouli, Amber and Brown sugar. A hymn celebrating the authenticity and uniqueness of those who wear the fragrance. A pure equilibrium of scents that create a perfect symphony. Love as sensuality and passion but at the same time representing self-love. FresShape Milano entitles this fragrance in an attempt to share the feeling of love in all of its possible forms.

Name: Om The Sound Of Universe Parfum
Description: Om by FreeShape Milano is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Om was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Bergamot, Cedar, Ginger, Gardenia and Ylang-Ylang; middle notes are Iris, Damask Rose, Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes, Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud), Vanilla and Musk. This fragrance creates a vibration of energy between the soul of those who wear it and their surrounding atmosphere. OM transpires as a deep breath. It is a balance between the body and mind. The spirit reconnects our inner self to the universe, which dominates unmeasurable energies.

Name: Akasha The 5th Element Parfum
Description: Akasha by FreeShape Milano is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Akasha was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Smoke, Artemisia, elemi and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Pimento, Chamomile, Rhubarb, Davana, Cardamom and Shiso; base notes are Myrrh, Styrax, Black Tea and Labdanum. It is pure, impressive and inalterable. It takes only a small bit of time to consolidate a single moment of life in memory. This convergence between body and mind triggers a fire of mysterious attraction. Akasha is a strong and powerful fragrance, a deep and intense blend built around green scents.

Name: Eywa Blessings From Nature Parfum
Description: Eywa by FreeShape Milano is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eywa was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Bitter Orange, Neroli and Plumeria; middle notes are Petitgrain, Magnolia and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes and Amber. This fragrance give the idea of conveying the value of loyalty for those who wear it. An anthem towards the uniqueness of who wears it. Bold and sensitive at the same time. An indomitable soul with a pure heart. A winged song that celebrates the force of nature and its positive energy.

Name: Maha The Greatest Soul Parfum
Description: Maha by FreeShape Milano is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Maha was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlo Ribero. Top notes are Saffron, Lemon, Cedar and Neroli; middle notes are Peony, Patchouli, Taif Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Opoponax, Amber and Musk. This fragrance enhances and inspires the determination that lies in each and every one of us. It contains hints of lemon, peony and patchouli cedar wood, which exudes a soft musky scent Freeshaoe Milano dedicates this fragrance to those who believe in their own dreams and pursue them in every way to reach their goal.

Name: Gentleman Cologne Man Edt
Description: Gentleman Cologne by Givenchy is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. Gentleman Cologne was launched in 2019. Gentleman Cologne was created by Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Bergamot, Lemon and Petitgrain; middle notes are Iris, Vetiver and Rosemary; base notes are Ambroxan and Musk. Gentleman Givenchy Cologne is announced as a fresh and unexpected fragrance that causes shock with its boldness and vigilance. This edition allegedly embodies the rebellious and free spirit of the Givenchy Gentleman character. The composition contains citrus aromas, rosemary, iris, vetiver, and musk. The creation is signed by perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp, just like the previous versions.  Top notes: bergamot, lemon, petitgrain. Heart notes: rosemary, iris, vetiver. Base notes: ambroxan, musk. It is available in bottles of 50 and 100 ml.

Name: Cool Water For Him Parfum
Description: Cool Water Parfum by Davidoff is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. Cool Water Parfum was launched in 2021. Cool Water Parfum was created by Jean-Christophe Hérault and IFF. Top notes are Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle note is Haitian Vetiver; base note is Sandalwood.

Name: Matchpoint Man Edp
Description: Match Point Eau De Parfum by Lacoste Fragrances is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Match Point Eau De Parfum was launched in 2022. Top notes are Citruses and Black Pepper; middle notes are Gentiana and Cardamom; base notes are Patchouli and Vetiver. The fusing notes of lemon and gentian contrast with the comfort of patchouli and vetiver, elevating the tension between energy and strength to its extreme for an impactful perfume. From the brand

Description: L.12.12 Eau de Parfum Blanc Edition Limitée Roland Garros by Lacoste Fragrances is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women. L.12.12 Eau de Parfum Blanc Edition Limitée Roland Garros was launched in 2021. Top notes are Star Anise, Finger Lime and Grapefruit; middle notes are Parsley, Eucalyptus and Clary Sage; base notes are Clay, Sage, Cedar and Vetiver.

Name: Le Male Le Parfum Edp Intense
Description: Le Male Le Parfum by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental fragrance for men. Le Male Le Parfum was launched in 2020. Le Male Le Parfum was created by Quentin Bisch and Natalie Gracia-Cetto. Top note is Cardamom; middle notes are Lavender and Iris; base notes are Vanilla, Oriental notes and Woodsy Notes.

Name: Lavender On The Rocks Edp
Description: Lavender on the Rocks by Atkinsons is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Lavender on the Rocks was launched in 2014. Top notes are Basil, Geranium and Rose; middle notes are Lavender, Hay, Honey and Almond; base notes are Saffron, Agarwood (Oud), Guaiac Wood and Amber. House of Atkinsons launches its new collection of fragrances called The Contemporary Collection, which includes three perfumes: Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. The collection represents a modern interpretation of the classic three perfume ingredients. This trio is designed to “transform the familiar into the fabulously unfamiliar in a way that is distinctive and intriguing”. Lavender on the Rocks is an icy and complex cocktail that exudes luxury. Its starts with a cool and metal combination of rose, geranium and basil. The heart of the perfume combines notes of lavender, lavender honey, hay and almonds. The base is warm with amber, guaiac wood, oud and saffron. The fragrances are available as 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Posh On The Green Edp
Description: Posh on the Green by Atkinsons is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. Posh on the Green was launched in 2014. Top notes are Petitgrain and Coriander; middle notes are Galbanum, Mint and Rose Geranium; base notes are Vetiver and Cedar. House of Atkinsons launches its new collection of fragrances called The Contemporary Collection, which includes three perfumes: Rose in Wonderland, Posh on the Green and Lavender on the Rocks. The collection represents a modern interpretation of the classic three perfume ingredients. This trio is designed to “transform the familiar into the fabulously unfamiliar in a way that is distinctive and intriguing”. Posh on the Green, for a lady or a dandy, is made of the finest green notes. It opens with green and floral notes of petit grain and coriander that interferes with the heart of mint, galbanum and pink geranium. The composition ends with dirty, smoky vetiver and cedar. The fragrances are available as 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: The Big Bad Cedar Edp
Description: The Big Bad Cedar by Atkinsons is a Woody Chypre fragrance for women and men. The Big Bad Cedar was launched in 2016. Top notes are Cardamom, Broom and Sage; middle note is Virginia Cedar; base notes are Cashmeran and Oakmoss.

Description: Scilly Neroli by Atkinsons is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. Scilly Neroli was launched in 2016. Top notes are Sea Notes, Lemon and Petitgrain; middle notes are Neroli Essence and Orange Blossom; base notes are Ambergris and Patchouli.

Name: Robinson Bear Edp
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Calone', 'Star Anise', 'Santolina'], 'Middle Notes': ['Juniper Berries', 'Virginia Cedar', 'Patchouli'], 'Base Notes': ['Labdanum', 'Oakmoss']}
Description: Robinson Bear by Atkinsons is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. Robinson Bear was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Calone, Star Anise and Santolina; middle notes are Juniper Berries, Virginia Cedar and Patchouli; base notes are Labdanum and Oakmoss.

Name: Le Vie Di Milano Edizione Millesimata Sea Daffodil
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bergamot', 'Hazelnut', 'Coconut'], 'Middle Notes': ['Sea Daffodil', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Immortelle'], 'Base Notes': ['Madagascar Vanilla', 'Cedar', 'Cypress']}
Description: Sea Daffodil Edizione Millesimata by Trussardi is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sea Daffodil Edizione Millesimata was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Véronique Nyberg. Top notes are Bergamot, Hazelnut and Coconut; middle notes are Sea Daffodil, Jasmine Sambac and Immortelle; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Cedar and Cypress. Le Vie di Milano Sea Daffodil Edizione Millesimata is the distillation of a summer memory that we never want to forget. Wearing Sea Daffodil is like reliving on your skin the olfactory experience of a walk on the seashore at sunset, even if we are in the city in the heart of winter. Perfumer Véronique Nyberg created an olfactory pyramid with saline, creamy, and sparkling notes that convey the perception of being buffeted by the sea breeze and enveloped by the warmth of the sand. The olfactive accord characterizing this Eau de Parfum Intense is Sea Daffodil, which dots Mediterranean beaches with its purity and luminous sensuality. Le Vie di Milano Sea Daffodil Edizione Millesimata opens with the sparkling, floral notes of bergamot blended with the sweet, enveloping notes of coconut and hazelnut.  The millèsime ingredient is at the heart of the fragrance: Sambac Jasmine, a flower from India that blooms in the evening, releasing its fresh, wild notes with orange blossom facets. Thanks to the E-Pure Jungle Essence™, an exclusive Mane extraction process that, inspired by the ancient enfleurage technique, involves the slow maceration of fresh flower petals in Jojoba oil, it was possible to obtain an excellent rendering of the Sambac Jasmine flower. Added to this is the accord of Sea Daffodil, a bulbous flower that grows on beaches of the Mediterranean, and Helichrysum with herbaceous notes and hints of licorice. In the base notes we find Cypress, which gives everything an airy, aromatic and woody touch, while Madagascar Vanilla absolute gives the bouquet a delicate gourmand nuance. Finally, cedarwood, with its characteristic dry notes, closes the circle of this unique composition, making it even more enticing.   Véronique Nyberg: “Between June and September on Mediterranean beaches you may come across Sea Daffodils with a sweet and luminous fragrance that blends with scent of the breeze. Le Vie di Milano Sea Daffodil Edizione Millesimata is a warm, delicate and salty fragrance. It has intriguing nuances, thanks to Sambac Jasmine, and sensual notes of Madagascar Vanilla.” TOP NOTES: Bergamot, Coconut, Hazelnut Neo Je™. HEART NOTES: Sambac Jasmine E-Pure Je™, Helichrysum Pure Je™, Sea Daffodil. BASE NOTES: Upcycled Cypress, Madagascar Vanilla Absolute, Upcycled Cedar Wood. OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Woody / Marine / Oriental

Name: Le Vie Di Milano Champaca Edizione Millesimata Edp
Description: Champaca Edizione Millesimata by Trussardi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Champaca Edizione Millesimata was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Cecile Matton. Top notes are Magnolia, Lemon Blossom and Freesia; middle notes are Champaca, Hazelnut and Praline; base notes are Vanilla, Heliotrope and Orcanox™. Champaca Eau de Parfum Intense is a tribute to "first times" in childhood. It is a journey back to carefree moments and the part of us that will always remain childlike. It is the essence of sweet embraces and the happiness of Sunday mornings in Milanese pastry shops filled with the aroma of vanilla, almond, pralines, and lemon. In the top accords we find lemon blossom, magnolia and freesia, which give the fragrance a fresh, luminous, floral envolée. In the heart notes, perfumer Cecile Matton wanted to recreate this experience of gourmand joy by combining notes of toasted hazelnut and caramel brittle from the Praline accord with the warm and sensual notes of the millèsime ingredient from which the fragrance takes its name: the precious Himalayan flower Champaca, which is considered the symbol of happiness. The Champaca flower was obtained through a sophisticated extraction process called E-Pure Jungle Essence™ inspired by the ancient technique of enfleurage, which makes it possible to capture all the sensuality of its scent of bare skin. The latter is traditionally available only in its absolute version with an intense red color that is not very functional for cosmetic use. With this type of extraction, however, the Mane Flavor and Fragrance manufacturer managed to obtain a colorless ingredient with intact olfactory characteristics. In the base notes we find the round, dense notes of Madagascar Vanilla. Instead of the absolute, an extract was preferred that captures the heaviest molecules of the raw materials and offers great persistence. Finally, we find the powdery and creamy Heliotrope accord and Orcanox™, a synthetic molecule deriving from processing Clary Sage with chypre and musky notes and fixative properties. Cecile Matton: “Unwrapping candy rekindled in me the childhood memory of when I would secretly eat pralines. I wanted to recreate this magical feeling of wonder and delight when I tasted them for the first time. The fragrance is rich in delicious notes, such as hazelnut, and the sensuality of Red Champaca, an extremely rare and sophisticated flower.”. TOP NOTES: Lemon Blossom, Magnolia, Freesia. HEART NOTES: Praline Accord, Red Champaca E-Pure Je™, Toasted Hazelnut Accord. BASE NOTES: Vanilla, Heliotrope, Orcanox™. OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Gourmand / Floral / Oriental

Name: Le Vie Di Milano Edizione Millesimata Clary Sage E
Description: Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata by Trussardi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Clary Sage Edizione Millesimata was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Massé. Top notes are Grapefruit and Clary Sage; middle notes are Balsam Fir, Myrtle and Hemlock; base notes are Orcanox™, Ambrettolide and Patchouli. Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense is a fantastic journey outside and inside us: it is walking on an imaginary path that reconnects us to nature, offering a sweeping bird's-eye view of everything and simultaneously profound introspection within ourselves. It is a tribute to one’s ability to disengage from a physical place — such as a frenetic city like Milan — and the present.  It is knowing how to be on the "Streets of Milan" yet in an abstract ‘elsewhere’. To create this transcendental effect, perfumer Julie Massé harmonized a bouquet of essences with a woody scent known in ancient medicinal wisdom for their relaxing and invigorating power. Clary Sage Eau de Parfum Intense has a charismatic personality that takes advantage of the presence of an extraordinary millèsime  ingredient, the concrete of Blue Hemlock, a conifer with greenish-blue reflections and fresh, vigorous notes able to convey an extraordinary relaxing effect. Clary Sage has a bright and energetic overture that comes from the semi-sweet, tart notes of grapefruit essential oil and those of Clary Sage [Salvia Sclarea], famous in phytotherapy for its healing, if not salvific, properties, as the Latin name infers. In perfumery it is loved for its fresh, spicy and herbaceous olfactory imprint. Furthermore, Sclareol is extracted through the steam distillation of Clary Sage leaves and flowers, whose aromatic and woody notes add depth and complexity to the fragrance and also help improve its persistence. In the heart notes, we find the millèsime ingredient, Blue Hemlock concrete, whose vibrant, aromatic notes instill a feeling of relaxation and a desire to merge with nature. The woody accord is completed by the fresh, spicy notes of Balsam Fir Absolute, which invite mental clarity, and the sweet and luminous notes of Myrtle. Finally, the essence of Patchouli with its magical and aphrodisiacal notes enriches the fragrance. To fix the bouquet, two synthetic molecules were used: Vegan Ambrettolide, a synthetic molecule with delicate musky notes that increases the persistence of the fragrance, and Orcanox™ — synthesized from Sclareol — replacing ambergris of animal origin with fixative properties and powdery, sensual notes. Julie Massé: “I wanted to create something unusual and provocative, strong enough to induce a dizzying sense of pleasure in which the unexpected note of Hemlock meets an enveloping note of Balsam Fir and a hypnotic note of Clary Sage.” TOP NOTES: Grapefruit Essential Oil, Clary Sage Essential Oil. HEART NOTES: Myrtle Essential Oil, Hemlock Concrete, Balsam Fir Absolute                                  BASE NOTES: Vegan Ambrettolide, Patchouli Essential Oil, Orcanox ™ OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Woody / Aromatic / Addictive

Name: Bright Crystal Woman Edt
Description: Bright Crystal by Versace is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Bright Crystal was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Yuzu, Pomegranate and Ice; middle notes are Peony, Lotus and Magnolia; base notes are Musk, Mahogany and Amber. The pink colored bottle announces softer and more luminous fragrance in comparison with Crystal Noir. Nowadays popular fruity note gives the composition slightly gourmand nuance. The top notes are pomegranate, Yuzu and frosted accord. Peony and magnolia are in the centre of the composition, while waterly fresh lotus note moderates the intensity and sweetnes of the floral accords. The opulent base introduces amber note extracted from plants, musk and red woods. The fragrance was designed by Alberto Morillas in 2006.

Name: Alive Woman Edp
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Madagascar Vanilla', 'Plum', 'Cinnamon', 'Apple', 'Black Currant'], 'Middle Notes': ['Jasmine Sambac', 'Thyme'], 'Base Notes': ['Woodsy Notes', 'Sandalwood', 'Cedar', 'Olive Tree']}
Description: Boss Alive Eau de Parfum by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women. Boss Alive Eau de Parfum was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Annick Menardo. Top notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Plum, Cinnamon, Apple and Black Currant; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac and Thyme; base notes are Woodsy Notes, Sandalwood, Cedar and Olive Tree. Under the COTY license, HUGO BOSS will present the newest fragrance for women, BOSS ALIVE, on February 15, 2020, composed by the renowned perfumer Annick Menardo. The new edition, BOSS ALIVE Eau de Parfum, is designed to celebrate the bliss of being immersed in the moment. "A new female scent inspired by women who make bold moves, ALIVE is defined by its addictive femininity, magnetism and strength; characteristics the BOSS Woman draws on each day as she creates her own definition of success." A phenomenal fruity explosion: "A sparkling burst of fruits at the top of this scent offers a radiant and addictive start that promotes a passionate state of mind in its wearer. With crunchy and energetic notes of Apple mingling together with playful and sharp Blackcurrant, sun-kissed Plum and warm Cinnamon, the sweet and fruity character of the scent is expressed at all moments – acting as a reminder that life can be a source of endless happiness if lived vibrantly. The addition of natural Madagascan Vanilla, deliciously sweet in many facets, rapidly develops and becomes a marker of the perfume, a symbol of the joie de vivre that the ALIVE woman possesses." An empowered floral magnetism: "The floral quality of ALIVE is drawn from the luminous, alluring Indian Jasmine Sambac, which is the center of this scent. A symbol of radiant femininity, it unfolds with simplicity and allure. Enveloping the senses with its free-spirited magnetism, it brings on the wearer’s irresistible confidence. The pure and white quality of the heart note contrasts with the subtle, dry aroma of Thyme; a reflection of her ability to balance awareness and abandon with ease." A confident woody femininity: "The backbone of ALIVE is created by the vibrant and strong woods at the base, composed with Chinese Cedarwood essences to create a strong character, both structural and soft at the same time. Combined with smooth, creamy Sandalwood, Olive wood and Alaskan Goldenwood, the scent’s intense yet reassuring warmth and strength inspires the wearer to march to the rhythm of her own drum. " BOSS Fragrances, a division of Coty Inc., is pleased to announce the faces of its new BOSS ALIVE fragrance campaign: Emma Roberts, Laura Harrier, Bruna Marquezine and Chloe Bennet. TOP NOTES: Apple, Blackcurrant, Plum, Cinnamon, Madagascan Vanilla. MIDDLE NOTES: Jasmine Sambac, Thyme. BASE NOTES: Chinese Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Olive wood, Alaskan Goldenwood. Addictive, magnetic and strong. The fragrance is as multifaceted as the woman who wears it, giving her the confidence to pursue her path and define her own version of success. Each time she applies it, it reminds her that living in the present is the place she feels her most fulfilled, free and happy, and when she values her personal happiness, new meaning is brought to each moment – and that’s what makes her #FeelALIVE. BOSS Fragrances, a division of Coty Inc., is pleased to announce the faces of its new BOSS ALIVE fragrance campaign: Emma Roberts, Laura Harrier, Bruna Marquezine and Chloe Bennet. "Four incredible women, one game-changing fragrance: BOSS ALIVE. Emma Roberts, Laura Harrier, Bruna Marquezine, and Chloe Bennet have been chosen by BOSS Parfums to star in an inspirational new campaign representing the modern, multifaceted face of the BOSS woman: carefree, confident, and inspired."BOSS ALIVE will be available as a 30ml Eau de Parfum, 50ml Eau de Parfum and 80ml Eau de Parfum  starting February 15th 2020

Name: Her Elixir Parfum
Description: Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum by Burberry is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum was launched in 2022. Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum was created by Jérôme di Marino and Maïa Lernout. Top notes are Strawberry and Blackberry; middle note is Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla, Amber and Sandalwood. Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum is a bold and sensual fragrance for women. Moving beyond the adventurous spirit of the Burberry Her Eau de Parfum, this scent is the latest chapter in the intensifying story of Burberry Her. Designed for women who dare to explore the unknown, Her Elixir de Parfum is for the free-spirited woman seeking the excitement of her next adventure. Sensual, irresistible, and not held back by boundaries, she possesses an addictive persona. A newly intense addition to the Burberry Her family, Her Elixir de Parfum for women offers signature fruity gourmand notes alongside a daring burst of dark red berries with jasmine, rounded with sensual and addictive vanilla and amber. Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum deepens the pink of the Eau de Parfum bottle, transforming it into an opaque finish representing the intensity of the fragrance inside and its confident and sensual nature. The design features raised Burberry lettering at the base. Top Notes: Strawberry & Blackberry Accord. Middle Notes: Jasmine Accord. Bottom Notes: Vanilla, Oriental, Sandalwood. Burberry Her Elixir de Parfum is available in size of 30, 50 and 100ml Eau de Parfum Intense.

Name: The Only One Female Edp
Description: The Only One by Dolce&Gabbana is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. The Only One was launched in 2018. Top notes are Violet, Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Coffee, Pear, Iris, Orange Blossom and Rose; base notes are Caramel, Vanilla and Patchouli. Dolce & Gabbana presents The Only One as a new variation on the theme of The One, the oriental-floral original from 2006. The Only One comes out at the end of August 2018 as a fragrance that "captures the essence of sophisticated and hypnotizing femininity." The floriental-gourmand composition plays on opposites: The violet blossom in contrast to the gourmand aroma of coffee gives character to the scent.  Top notes: bergamot, violet. Heart: coffee, iris. Base: patchouli, vanilla. The face of the campaign is actress Emilia Clarke. Dolce & Gabbana The Only One is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Nomade Jasmin Naturel Intense Woman Edp
Description: Nomade Jasmin Naturel Intense by Chloé is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Nomade Jasmin Naturel Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Caroline Dumur. Top notes are Mirabelle and Pear; middle notes are Egyptian Jasmine, Dates and Freesia; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Oakmoss and Patchouli.

Name: Bloom Woman Edp
Description: Gucci Bloom by Gucci is a Floral fragrance for women. Gucci Bloom was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top note is Jasmine; middle note is Tuberose; base note is Rangoon Creeper. Gucci Bloom: Debuting the First Fragrance by Alessandro Michele: “I wanted a green fragrance, a courageous scent that transports you to a vastgarden filled with many flowers and plants, a bouquet of abundance. The garden is as beautiful as women are; colorful, wild, diverse, where there is everything. GucciBloom smells of this garden in order to travel to a place that is not there,” Alessandro Michele. Flowering from the authentic spirit of the women Alessandro Michele champions is an attitude of freedom to be who you want to be. Mixed with the color, decoration and pattern of the creative director’s design canon, the women he dresses are flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way: they are in bloom. The first Gucci fragrance developed wholly under Alessandro Michele’s creative vision encapsulates this modern philosophy that is the guiding vision for the House. Gucci Bloom celebrates the authenticity, vitality and diversity of the women he designs for, and those that identify themselves in his vision. True to who they are, these young women experience life and its fruits, blooming into their real selves. They convey their personal point-of-view without conventional limitations. They live for memorable experiences, to create stories and connect and be inspired by the objects, culture and art they choose to be surrounded by. Architect of every element of the scent, Alessandro Michele has infused Gucci Bloom’s idea of lushness, life and vigor in each fragrant note, the dreamy campaign and its unconventional design. ABOUT THE SCENT:  Blended by master perfumer Alberto Morillas with direction from Alessandro Michele, the fragrance is created to unfold like its name. The creative director envisioned the scent as a thriving garden full of diverse types of flowers and the rich perfume it emits. Authenticity is woven through qualitative, highly-concentrated natural ingredients. Notes blossom out like a concentration of flowers, the unique expression of the new to the world ingredients, brings a new olfactory experience. Natural Tuberose absolute harvested from India is interlaced with natural Jasmine absolute. Jasmine bud extract, obtained through an exclusive method of co-extraction that blends a natural quality of jasmine and captive moleculesto impart a fresh green and petal scent on the skin. Gucci Bloom also features notes of another plant used in perfume-making for the first time, the Rangoon Creeper. Discovered in South India, the Rangoon Creeper embodies the new scent’s concept and name, as it changes color from white, gradually darkens to pink then finally to red when it blooms. The vine’s flowers are redolent with a slightly powdery feminine floral perfume. ABOUT THE DESIGN:  An arbiter and seeker of beauty, Alessandro Michele ideated a flacon and packaging that encapsulates the fragrance’s spirit dedicated to the diversity of women. “The bottle is not designed feminine to seduce men, but to keep company with the women who wear the perfume. Retro and tender because of its color, with clean, slender lines, and not crafted in transparent glass but in porcelain, a material that I love very much,” he said. A vintage powder pink shades the lacquered porcelain square-shaped bottle, appliquéd with the Gucci label ribbed and framed in black. The outer carton is covered inside and outside in Herbarium, a red-and-white toile de Jouy House print of leaves, cherry branches and flowers framed in black. ABOUT CAMPAIGN:  Encapsulating the very meaning of Gucci Bloom, the campaign’s idea is revealed through the contemporary women of Gucci: actress Dakota Johnson, actress and model Hari Nef and artist Petra Collins. Friends of Alessandro Michele, they have a special connection with the House, their talent resonating with Gucci’s new vision. Their diverse individual beauty is shot by Glen Luchford, allowing them to radiate in the campaign’s transformative setting. They wear Gucci Bloom during their day in the city, and it changes the surrounding urbanity into an imaginary stroll in a fantastical English garden. Tea on a sidewalk flourishing with blooms, walking in an apartment overgrown with verdant plants, and swimming at dusk in a lake entangled with shimmering flowers and reeds. Dancing, strolling, rejoicing in being free and full of life: this trio embody Gucci’s new vitality and the captivating, transporting nature of Gucci Bloom. The fragrance will be available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Fashion house of Michael Kors reveals new feminine fragrance pillar Gorgeous! in early 2021. "A celebration of women and the confident female spirit, Michael Kors Gorgeous! Eau de Parfum is a bold floral woody fragrance that knows how to make an entrance. Reinterpreting a classic, lush white floral bouquet in a totally modern way, Michael Kors Gorgeous! comes to life through an all-new arrangement that is enhanced by a smoky tobacco accord and features a powerful wood finale. It's a combination of optimism and ease, two complementary qualities that represent the Michael Kors woman. Empowering and invigorating, this fragrance captures the essence of female confidence and the importance of feeling good in your own skin." Michael Kors Gorgeous! is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum, with a 10 ml travel spray.

Donna is the classic of Italian perfume tradition. This wonderful scent carries the recognizable mark of the beautiful Italy. It is a perfume filled with sun, radiating noble and cheerful temperament, holding the secret of magnetic attractiveness that Italian women have. The composition enchants you from the top: mandarin blends in with floral note of hyacinth, ginger and coriander passionately concluding their sweet duet. The heart is noble with flowers like ylang-ylang, rose and tuberose, spiced with carnation. The base is balmy – warm with notes of patchouli, cedar wood, labdanum and benzoin. This essence of Italian sensuality was created by Jean Guichard in 1994.

Description: My Euphoria by Calvin Klein is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. My Euphoria was launched in 2023. My Euphoria was created by Frank Voelkl and Nathalie Lorson. Top note is Black Currant; middle notes are Orchid, Sesame and Tuberose; base notes are Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud) and Bamboo. "Smoky yet sweet, this new multi-faceted floral amber fragrance captures the essence of joy and euphoria. A reimagination of the classic notes of the original fragrance collection, perfumers Frank Voelkl and Nathalie Lorson customized a blend of compelling ingredients while still highlighting the hero orchid note of the Euphoria fragrance collection. The new composition opens with juicy blackcurrant essence. At the heart, the feminine orchid flambé accord is contrasted by smoky black sesame for a sophisticated and fiery floral center. To round out the base, an exclusive blend of oud, bamboo and sandalwood creates a mysterious woody facet. The rich warmth of these notes, alongside a lasting trail of tuberose, creates an unforgettable fragrance that channels feelings of confidence and empowerment." Calvin Klein My Euphoria is available in 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

The latest perfume of the Hugo Boss collection opens with juicy and velvety shades of peach combined with freesia blossom in top notes. The heart is based on osmanthus, famous for apricot scent, while drydown features roasted cocoa, which deepend the composition and provides a darker note and a characteristic gourmand twist. Advertising face of the campaign is model Anna Ewers, for whom Jason Wu says that she is very feminine and at the same time very powerful in the new photos. The campaign photos were taken by Darren Aronofsky on the last floor of Freedom Tower in New York – according to wwd. Flacon of the fragrance Boss The Scent for Her is available as a 30ml EDP, 50ml EDP and 100ml EDP.

Name: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Woman Edp
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Dewberry', 'Coconut'], 'Middle Notes': ['Magnolia', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Clary Sage'], 'Base Notes': ['Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Blonde Woods']}
Description: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia by Gucci is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was launched in 2023. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was created by Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Dewberry and Coconut; middle notes are Magnolia, Jasmine Sambac and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Blonde Woods. In 2023, Gucci introduces Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia, a new flanker in the line of Flora by Gucci. The fragrance invites you to step into a world of confidence and inner strength as the latest addition to the  Floral Fantasy collection. Presented in a purple lacquered bottle. The scent adds a new dimension to the #Florafontasy universe. Designed to celebrate inner strength, its powerful spirit is once again embodied by multi-platinum-selling recording artist, songwriter, and trailblazer Miley Cyrus in the transportive campaign, directed and shot by artist Petra Collins. In 2021 Miley Cyrus debuted as the face of Flora Fantasy, a world brimming with flowers, flutty animals, and kawaii cuteness. Constantly shitting between dreams and reality, this virtual space is inspired by the Gucci flora collection of fragrances, each built around a noble flower. Within various scenarios, all forms of happiness are represented here. A garden inhabited by kittens and puppies is home to the pink bottle of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia.  While the turquoise bottle of Gucci Flors Gorgeous Jasmine blends effortlessly with the comforting bedroom space, now, the latest chapter of the story sees Miley stepping out of the house and into the outdoors, radiating confidence and an intuitive mindset through Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Eau de Parfum. Perfumers Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne's creation is filled with unexpected yet complementary notes. Taking inspiration from free-spirited women, the scent is built around Magnolia Alba, an ancient and rare plant that requires a specific harvest and careful distillation process. A clary sage-like edge balances its fruity, floral sweetness to reflect an intuitive nature. The resulting Magnolia Essence exudes cheerfulness and a luminous noble spirit. To enhance the sweetness of the Magnolia Essence, a Dewberries Accord is added for a fruity, juicy dimension, striking a balance between freshness and sensuality. Parchoul Essence is then used to around the scent. The perfumers capture the plant's intense woodiness from Indonesia's best-quality Patchoull, creating a subtly earthy and leathery aroma. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia also features Blond Woods which provides a gentle, sensual touch, while Coconut Accord delivers an irresistible vanilla freshness that is both smooth and addictive. Finally, the Jasmine Sambac Absolute lends a green intensity and warmth that comes together with a mellowing trail of Musk. The House's iconic Flora pattern, featuring vibrant blooms and rich hues, adorns both the bottle and outer packaging of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia. Wrapped in a captivating purple shade, the scent acts as a lucky charm and a reminder to trust in oneself. Artist Petra Collins captures the Campaign. The Flora Fantasy campaign transports viewers to a captivating inner world where Miley Cyrus is the protagonist. In the new visual, Miley holds the Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia bottle in the sun in a vast outdoor space win pastel-tinted skies. The hues conure to the film's surreal spirit, a fantasy that moves from a heightened reality to an anime adventure. Throughout the journey, Miley moves from cuddling animals in the garden of a house to playing an electric guitar on the beach. The film ends with new scenes displaying the three Gucci Flora scents on the sands of limitless outdoor space. Here the golden pink skies reflect the infinite possibilities of one's own dreamland. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia is available as a 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau De Parfum.

Description: Eros Pour Femme by Versace is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Eros Pour Femme was launched in 2014. Eros Pour Femme was created by Alberto Morillas, Olivier Cresp and Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Sicilian Lemon, Pomegranate and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Lemon Blossom, Jasmine Sambac, Jasmine and Peony; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan, Woodsy Notes and Sandalwood. Versace is launching the new fragrance for women as an addition to the popular men’s edition Eros from 2012. Versace Eros Pour Femme arrives on shelves of perfumeries in Italy in December 2014 as the fragrant seductress of the God of love—Eros. The women’s fragrance in a glamorous gold color flacon is signed by perfumers of the Firmenich company Alberto Morillas, Olivier Cresp and Nathalie Lorson who worked together on creating the new composition. "Eros is God of love and the goal of Eros Pour Femme campaign was to present that Eros was seduced and to suggest the strength of a woman," stated Donatella Versace, who added that photos for the campaign were taken in Pinewood studio in London in water reservoirs where the James Bond movies were filmed. The campaign is signed by photographers Mert Alas and Marcus Piggott. The faces of the campaign are Brian Shimansky, known as advertising face of Eros and Lara Stone, advertising face of Eros Pour Femme who comes out of the water in a white dress and golden gladiator sandals! The composition of the new perfume for women Eros Pour Femme opens with Sicilian lemon, Calabrian bergamot and pomegranate accords, with a heart of lemon, sambac jasmine absolute, jasmine infusion and peony. The base incorporates sandalwood, ambrox, musk and various woody notes. The fragrance bottle Eros Pour Femme is rounded and embellished with a prominent relief Medusa symbol on the central part of bottle and the stopper, as well as with a typical Greek motif on the edges. It is made of glass and embellished with metallic golden details and cap. Instead of a box, the bottle will be packed in a small case which opens on the sides. The fragrance will be available as 30ml, 50ml and 100 ml EDP. The fragrance will first be launched in Italy in December 2014, and in 2015 in Europe and worldwide.
